The nitrile group (C≡N) is also polar and can participate in dipole-dipole interactions raising the melting point further, this increase could be estimated at +15°C. Additionally, the molecular complexity added by these groups, alongside possible intermolecular interactions, may enhance the melting point. However, the overall structure must also be considered for steric effects which could lessen the impact of these polar interactions.
